title: Cumin-Spiced Lamb Burgers
ingredients: ['450g minced lamb', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint leaves or 1 tablespoon dried mint', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano or 1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 teaspoon sherry', '1 teaspoon white wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon black treacle', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/4 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 teaspoon crushed chillies', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 pitta breads', '115g feta cheese, crumbled']
